lines.text: Where you from?
Witch Mountain.
Sounds like some hick town to me.
Tony, why are you doing these things? Why are you using your powers against me?
I've lost all faith in science.
[the security guard is levitating at the ceiling where Tony left him]
Could you get me down please?
[Tia lowers him to the floor]
Thank you. Now, where are you going?
We're going in there.
Oh, no. No one goes in there without ID.
[Tia levitates him back up to the ceiling]
Who's that?
That's my sister, my sister Tia.
Well this is no time for a family reunion.
They must've flown!
Well don't *you* try it.
It's a shame the way they raise kids today.
Tia, open the gate.
No, everybody join hands. 1... 2... 3
[the kids energize over the gate]
